item.Ime: OMP Seat mounting dedicated for: Citroen C2/C3
item.Kratki: OMP Seat mounting dedicated for Citroen C2/C3.
item.Opis: A specialist range of racing developed brackets and mounts designed to attach seats. This steel sub frame is designed and manufactured by OMP to fix to the standard chassis floor of the vehicle. They are finished in a tough durable black paint and supplied brand new in OMP packaging. Once they are fixed in place, you then need to attach the appropriate seat mounting brackets between the subframe and your seat. We sell the full range of OMP seat fixing brackets on our website.

This steel sub frame is designed and manufactured by OMP to fix to the standard chassis floor of the vehicle. They are finished in a tough durable black paint and supplied brand new in OMP packaging. Once they are fixed in place, you then need to attach the appropriate seat mounting brackets between the subframe and your seat. We sell the full range of OMP seat fixing brackets on our website.
